attributes.action: Reduce or freeze the energy price cap
attributes.additional_details: To reduce or freeze the energy price cap to help low income families pay their energy bills
attributes.background: To reduce or freeze the energy price cap to help low income families pay their energy bills

rejection.details:
It’s not clear what the petition is asking the UK Government or Parliament to do.

Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about energy prices, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to decrease these.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Temporarily suspend all taxes on all fuels and energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610585

Subsidise a 'basic' amount of electricity for households: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616915

Establish a not-for-profit state owned energy provider: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617446

Introduce a "Triple lock" to restrict energy cap increases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621347

Recall Parliament to consider the Energy Price Cap Increase (Cancellation) Bill: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621634

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
